name: Adam Brashear
text: Setup: Put the Matter Manipulation upgrade into play. Prepared — Action: Choose a Blue Marvel card in your discard pile and place it on the top of your deck. (Limit once per round.)

name: Blue Marvel
text: Living Antimatter Reactor — Resource: Generate a [energy] resource. (Limit once per phase). “I'd do whatever is right, wherever and whenever it needs to be done - and I wouldn't care what anyone thinks. Not anymore.”

name: Matter Manipulation
text: Permanent. Setup. Hero Interrupt: When you overpay for a card, Blue Marvel gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF until the end of the round. (Limit twice per round.)

name: Spectrum
text: [star] Spectrum gets +1 hit point for each energy counter on her. Interrupt: When Spectrum enters play, place 1 energy counter on her (to a maximum of 3) for each resource you overpaid for Spectrum's cost. “The name is Monica, or Spectrum if you're nasty.”

name: Anti-Matter Forcefield
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take damage from an enemy attack, prevent all of that damage. If you overpaid for this card, deal that much damage to your attacker. “Don't try it!”

name: Cosmic Awareness
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you overpaid for this card, remove 2 additional threat and this thwart ignores the crisis icon ([crisis]). “My greatest power cannot be measured in feats of strength or cosmic awareness, but in possibilities.”

name: Supersonic Flight
text: Hero Action: Ready your hero. If you overpaid for this card, draw 1 card. Hero Response: After you change form, make a basic attack or thwart without exhausting your hero. If you overpaid for this card, draw 1 card.

name: Kadesh Base
text: Action: Exhaust Kadesh Base → draw 1 card (2 cards instead if you are in alter-ego), then choose 1 card in your hand and shuffle it into your deck. The undersea home of Dr. Adam Brashear, located at the bottom of the Marianas Trench.

name: Uatu the Watcher
text: Action: Exhaust Uatu the Watcher → search the top 3 cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. "Uatu, if you pull your "I cannot interfere" face any harder, you're going to prolapse.” —Blue Marvel

name: Anti-Matter Generation
text: Resource: Spend a [energy] resource → generate [energy][energy] resources. (Limit once per phase). “Shield your eyes, I'm going to unleash my full power!” —Blue Marvel

name: Blue Marvel's Suit
text: You get +2 hit points. Hero Response: After you overpay for a card, deal 1 damage to an enemy for each resource you overpaid for that card's cost. “Actually, it's one of my late wife's designs." —Blue Marvel

name: Crisis Monitor
text: Interrupt: When you reveal an encounter card or your obligation is revealed, ready your hero (you may change to hero form first). If you cannot, remove 2 threat from a scheme. (Limit once per phase). “Computer, monitor emergency traffic."

name: Superhuman Speed
text: Blue Marvel's attacks ignore the guard keyword. Hero Response: After you overpay for a card, remove 1 threat from a scheme for each resource you overpaid for that card's cost.
